mcq.statement: Newton's third law of motion states that for every action, there is an equal and opposite reaction. Which of the following statements can be inferred from the above-mentioned law of motion? Statement 1: For every interaction, there is a pair of forces acting on the two interacting objects., Statement 2: The magnitude of the force on the first object equal the magnitude of the force on the second object., Statement 3: Forces always comes in pairs - equal and opposite action reaction force pairs., Statement 4: Action and its reaction act on two same bodies., Statement 5: Action and its reaction act on two different bodies.

options.a: Only 1st statement can be inferred from 3rd Law of Motion
options.b: All statement except 4th can be inferred from 3rd Law of Motion
options.c: All statement except 5th can be inferred from 3rd Law of Motion
options.d: All statements can be inferred from 3rd Law of Motion
